attributes.action: Raise Minimum wage of SIA licence holders to £10 a hour
attributes.additional_details:
Most sia licence holders are on national minimum wage at £7.83.

The job licence holders do and the risk they take each day is taken for granted and it needs to change
attributes.background: Sia licence holders are the front line in security in the U.K. any event, night club, supermarkets, government buildings Sia licence holders are there to keep you safe and secure
